name: Report a Non-Compliant Website
about: Report a site using dark patterns or pay-to-reject models.
title: ''
labels: Report
assignees: ''

---

### Website URL
(e.g., https://example.com)

### Type of Violation
- [ ] **Pay-or-Consent:** Requires a subscription to reject cookies.
- [ ] **Hidden Option:** The 'Reject' button is hidden or barely visible.
- [ ] **Friction / Click-Fatigue:** Requires manual toggling of dozens of vendors.
- [ ] **Other:** (Please describe below)

### Description
Please briefly describe what happens when you try to refuse cookies on this site. 

### Screenshot (Optional)
If possible, please attach a screenshot of the dark pattern or the paywall.
